description: Iulian Lupu and Romeo-Kiristian Macovei receive 18-year sentences after a jury found them guilty.
title: Stoke-on-Trent men jailed after woman kidnapped and raped
title_page: Stoke-on-Trent men jailed after woman kidnapped and raped - BBC News
maintext:
Two men have been jailed for the kidnap and rape of a woman after she left a nightclub in Staffordshire.
Iulian Lupu and Romeo-Kiristian Macovei, both of Liverpool Road, Stoke-on-Trent, approached the woman in the early hours of 10 December 2023 in Newcastle-under-Lyme.
The next thing the victim remembered was waking up at an address in Stoke-on-Trent. Lupu and Macovei were both there and one was naked, Staffordshire Police said.
The woman made her way home before reporting the incident to police and the two men were identified and arrested a few days later.
